title: Party leaders to meet via Zoom on Wednesday (11)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Parliament Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena said that the Party Leaders meeting will be held at 3 PM via Zoom on Wednesday (11).
The current political state in the country, and the upcoming Parliament week will be discussed at this meeting.
On Tuesday (10), the Speaker decided to cancel the party leaders meeting citing security concerns of MPs.
